casebody.data:
STATE
v.
WEBER 2018-1670 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On review of an order certifying a conflict. The court determines that a conflict exists. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2018-0012, State v. Hitchcock, and briefing schedule stayed.

Fischer, J., would not hold the cause.

French, J., dissents.

William J. Klatt, J., of the Tenth District Court of Appeals, sitting for Stewart, J.
